text_block_list.text:
One weekend, I'm heading to the<n>shopping
district with Mihono Bourbon,<n>when...

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
The Sweet Stamp Rally is about to<n>begin! ☆ Now
recruiting participants!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ¿Dulce... Rally de Sellos?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ¡Oh! ¡Hola, ustedes dos! ¿Quieren unirse al<n>evento?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You collect one stamp for each dessert<n>you eat
from the different stores in the<n>shopping district!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
If you collect all fifty stamps, you get to<n>eat an
exclusive, completely<n>custom-made confection!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Completamente... hecho... a medida...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
So... you are saying it would be possible<n>to craft a
flawless treat that uses<n>adrenaline-boosting fruits
and nutrients<n>for increasing muscle mass?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
...Well, yeah, it's completely<n>custom-made, after
all! No problem! The<n>manager should be able to
whip up<n>something like that!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. The total caloric content of fifty<n>varieties
of desserts is massive.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, the reward is alluring...Extremely alluring. Please, give meinstructions.
choice_data_list: ...Lo siento, pero no podemos esta vez.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's too bad! Well, you do have<n>some races
coming up, so it's probably<n>best to watch what
you eat.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Understood, Trainer. However, please<n>allow me
to clarify one point.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
To me, your orders are infallible.<n>Therefore,
apologies are unnecessary. In<n>fact...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Aprecio tu consideración.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: U-uhhh... Me siento como la tercera rueda<n>aquí.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... You two really get along well.<n>Heck, the
pair of you might be even<n>sweeter than all these
desserts put<n>together!

We don't end up participating in the<n>event... but
hearing Mihono Bourbon's<n>kind words warms my
heart.

And so, we end up participating in the<n>stamp
rally...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Munch, munch... gulp. Consumption ofitem fifty, the Deluxe Special Sundae, iscomplete.

text_block_list.name: Store Manager
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for participating! Now, what<n>would you
like for your custom-made<n>confection?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Oh, um, you wanted a "flawless" dessert,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes. One that includes fruits that<n>provide relief
from fatigue and nutrients<n>for increasing muscle
mass.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I require it to include the following<n>
ingredients—apple, natto, oyster, miso,<n>
fermented fish, and protein powder.

text_block_list.name: Store Manager
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Hahaha, got it! This will put my<n>thirty years
as a pastry chef to the test!

Some days later, a jet-black cake that<n>seems to
include all the ingredients<n>Mihono Bourbon
requested arrives, and<n>she polishes it off with
satisfaction.
